txt.en:
'Our scouts have reported that the few remaining Dunlendings have managed to reinforce their lumber-camp. Apparently, they have a battle-horn with which they can summon their leader, a man by the name of Tudur.

'Return to the Dunlending-camp, [placeholder], and look to the east of the pond. Search for their battle-horn and use it to challenge Tudur. When he arrives, defeat him...perhaps then the Dunlendings will return to their own land.

'Hurry, [placeholder], before Saruman can send allies to reinforce the camp.'

'Well done again, [placeholder]. With their leader gone, I do not doubt that the Dunlendings will soon return to their homes in the south.\n\n'You have earned the gratitude of both Elf and tree this day, [placeholder]. Thank you.'
'My scouts tell me that the Dunlendings' battle-horn lies just beyond the pond to the east of Gwingris, in Sâd Rechu. Start your search there.'
'The Dunlendings should no longer be a true threat to us, thanks to your efforts.'
Dunlendings have established a lumber-camp in the wooded land of Sâd Rechu, where they collect wood for the use of Saruman's craftsmen.
Use the battle-horn to summon Tudur and defeat him
The battle-horn is in the camp east of the pond at Sâd Rechu, east of Gwingris.\n\nInufileg has instructed you to use the Dunlendings' battle-horn to issue a challenge to their leader, Tudur.
Inufileg is at Gwingris, west of Sâd Rechu.\n\nYou should return to Gwingris and tell Inufileg of your success.
